desc: Eleventh Hour CISSP Study Guide serves as a guide for those who want to be information security professionals. The main job of an information security professional is to evaluate the risks involved in securing assets and to find ways to mitigate those risks. Information security jobs include firewall engineers, penetration testers, auditors, and the like.

details.authors: Eric Conrad, Seth Misenar, Joshua Feldman

title: Eleventh Hour CISSP: Study Guide
